Home.hero-text: With more than 35 years at your service, we are your best choice for airport transfers in Los Cabos
Home.solutions: We have solutions for all your transportation needs
Home.private-text: Our most convenient solution. If you either come alone, with family or with friends, having you own transport can really make a difference.
Home.shared-text: If you donâ€™t mind sharing a ride and you have enough time to arrive to your destination, you can travel comfortably in our shuttles.
Home.groups-text: If you are traveling with a big group our motor coaches can take you to your destination while you enjoy our premium seats.

errors.too-many-people: There's too many people for one vehicle only. Have you seen our groups page?
errors.departure-after-arrival: Departure date must be after arrival date
errors.not-available: Hotel not available for shared vehicles
errors.form: Please check again the form. There are errors in the values you are submitting

form.reservations-text: You can choose to make a reservation or pay in full. In case you pay the reservation, the rest must be paid IN CASH once you meet one of our representatives.

receipt.text: We received your order. Your order number is #{ orderId }. You will receive an email with all the details from info@settur.com.mx. If you need any additional information don't hesitate to call us to

terms-and-conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms-and-conditions.payment-text: Your credit card will be charged immediately in US Dollars or for AMEX in Mexican Pesos and will appear on your statement as SETTUR LOS CABOS. All Charges are subject to the bank rate of exchange on the day it is settled to your account. SETTUR LOS CABOS is not responsible for variances, not has control over the rates of exchange.
terms-and-conditions.cancellation-text: A 15% fee per service will be charged for any cancellation done with 48 hours in advance of the service date. After this date any cancellation will be subject to 100% non-refundable fee. Please call +52 (55)31455826 or send an email to reservations@settur.com.mx for changes, questions or to cancel this service to avoid full charges. You must obtain a cancellation number.
terms-and-conditions.changes-text: In the event that you need to make a change it has to be at least 24 hours in advance of the service date and a 15% fee per service will be charged.

services.hero-text: Enjoy your stay in Los Cabos and let us handle your transfers.
services.private-text: Choose between our 5 unit options according to your needs. All of our units are in perfect conditions to accomodate you and your family or friends so you can enjoy your vactions.
services.private-items: We adequate to your needs. If you are traveling with any of these objects just let us know when you reserve.
services.child-seats-text: Do you need a seat for your kids? We have them:
services.shopping: Do you need shopping for your stay? We can give you 30min of shopping time when you arrive.
services.shared-text: Enjoy our comfortable vans that will leave you on the doorstep of your hotel.
services.group-service-text: Are you traveling with a large group of people and you want to go to a lot of places? Contact us so we can plan your route.

error.general: There was an error. Sorry for the inconvenience.
error.order: We couldn't find your order. Contact us if you keep getting this error.
error.receipt: There was an error with your receipt. Contact us for more info.
